title: Welcome

title: AsoPMR Team Building
content:
Last Friday, the AsoPMR team took a break to enjoy a #teambuilding day that combined laughter, challenges, and camaraderie 🤝
We started the day with a great group breakfast, followed by a mysterious #escaperoom activity at Escape Hunt 🕵️‍♀️🔐, where we put our communication, logic, and teamwork skills to the test 🧠(and we made it out just in time...! ⏳😅)
Afterward, we wrapped up the experience with a meal full of anecdotes and good times, strengthening the bonds that make us a better team 🍽️ 👥
✨ These moments remind us that, beyond work, the most valuable asset is the human team behind each project.
#Teambuilding #Teamwork #AsoPMR
description: Last Friday, the AsoPMR team took a break to enjoy a #teambuilding day

title: UOC - Final Project Area
content:
I have been assigned option 1 of my Bachelor's Thesis (TFG) area request for the Degree in Computer Engineering, which is the Mobile Application Development TFG area.
Furthermore, for my TFG at the UOC, I will be presenting my own Android app, doTHEWORKOUT, my workout app.
description: doTHEWORKOUT for Bachelor's Thesis at the UOC
